title: Event Schedule
description: A schema defining an array of events.

title.description: Human readable name of the event, properly capitalized.

time.description: Start time of the event in ISO 8601 format. When importing, assume from US East Coast time zone (EDT) if not specified.

end_time.description: End time of the event in ISO 8601 format, if applicable.

tent.description: The slug of the tent that this event is in, from a list of valid slugs. Null if unknown.

near.description: True if the event is 'near' the tent, false if it is 'in' the tent.
